description: A dashboard to help with cost and utilisation

options.content:
This dashboard shows indicative monthly costing for the cluster, based on **current** requests for CPU, RAM and Storage.  
Utilisation figures represent utilsation of current, active deployments vs their request limits, and **does not** include data from instances no longer running.

panels.description: This gauge shows the current CPU use vs CPU available
panels.title: CPU Utilisation

panels.description: This panel shows current CPU reservation requests by applications, vs CPU available
panels.title: CPU Requests

targets.expr:
sum (
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
  + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

+

sum (
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
  + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

+ 

sum(container_fs_limit_bytes{device=~"^/dev/[sv]d[a-z][1-9]$",id="/",environment="$env"}) / 1024 / 1024 / 1024 * $costStorageStandard

panels.description: This table shows the comparison of CPU and RAM requests by applications, vs the capacity of the node
panels.title: Cluster Node Utilisation by CPU and RAM requests

panels.description: This gauge shows current RAM use by RAM available
panels.title: RAM Utilisation

panels.description: This panel shows current RAM reservation requests by applications, vs RAM available
panels.title: RAM Requests

targets.expr:
(
  sum(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true",environment="$env"}/1000*($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))) by(namespace)
  or
  count(
    count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
  ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

(
  sum(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true",environment="$env"}/1000*$costpcpu) by(namespace)
  or
  count(
    count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
  ) by(namespace) -1
)

sum(
   count(count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by (pod_name, namespace)) by (pod_name, namespace)  
   * on (pod_name, namespace) 
   sum(irate(container_cpu_usage_seconds_total{namespace!="",environment="$env"}[1m])) by (pod_name, namespace)
) by (namespace) * 1000
/
sum(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by (namespace) * 100

(
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true",environment="$env"}/1024/1024/1024*($costram- ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))) by(namespace)
  or
  count(
    count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
  ) by(namespace) -1
)

+

(
  sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true",environment="$env"}/1024/1024/1024*$costpram) by(namespace)
  or
  count(
    count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
  ) by(namespace) -1
)

sum(
   count(count(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by (pod_name, namespace)) by (pod_name, namespace)  
   * on (pod_name, namespace) 
   sum(avg_over_time(container_memory_working_set_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}[1m])) by (pod_name, namespace)
) by (namespace)
/
sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by (namespace) * 100

sum (
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
  + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

or

sum (
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
  + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

or

count(
  count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
) by(namespace) -1

# Add the CPU
(
  (
    sum(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true",environment="$env"}/1000*($costcpu - ($costcpu / 100 * $costDiscount))) by(namespace)
    or
    count(
      count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
    ) by(namespace) -1
  )
  
  +
  
  (
    sum(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true",environment="$env"}/1000*$costpcpu) by(namespace)
    or
    count(
      count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
    ) by(namespace) -1
  )
)

+ 
# Add the RAM
(
  (
    sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible!="true",environment="$env"}/1024/1024/1024*($costram - ($costram / 100 * $costDiscount))) by(namespace)
    or
    count(
      count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
    ) by(namespace) -1
  )
  
  +
  
  (
    sum(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",cloud_google_com_gke_preemptible="true",environment="$env"}/1024/1024/1024*$costpram) by(namespace)
    or
    count(
      count(container_spec_memory_limit_bytes{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
    ) by(namespace) -1
  )
)

+
# Add the storage
(

  sum (
    sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
    + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
    sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
  ) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD
  
  or
  
  sum (
    sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
    + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
    sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
  ) by (namespace) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard
  
  or
  
  count(
    count(container_spec_cpu_shares{namespace!="",environment="$env"}) by(namespace)
  ) by(namespace) -1

)

sum (
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass=~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
  + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim,storageclass) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageSSD

or

sum (
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_info{storageclass!~".*ssd.*",environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace, storageclass)
  + on (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace) group_right(storageclass)
  sum(kube_persistentvolumeclaim_resource_requests_storage_bytes{environment="$env"}) by (persistentvolumeclaim, namespace)
) by (namespace,persistentvolumeclaim,storageclass) / 1024 / 1024 /1024 * $costStorageStandard

title: Analysis by Cluster
